author: James Joyce
text: I want as many documents as possible and at once: also the key of my trunk. The ‘Speaker’ sent my cheque to Cabra 30 Nov last therefore it has been cashed(?). Examine Charlie. I write to ‘Speaker’ tonight. Your letter is very dull. Send criticisms of my chapters and story. I do not like so much talk about prospective human beings. Could you send on a photograph or two. Do not delay so long executing my requests as I waste a lot of ink. What about the Strauss? Jim
